questions.explanation:
Becky.

	Becky was an old girlfriend of Sam's. Sam informed her that he and Diane were going together now.

questions.text: Who was late coming to Cheers?
questions.explanation:
Norm.

	They suspected Norm might have found a job. However, they then rejected that idea because they figured he would tell them if he had found a job.

dishwasher.

	Norm got a job at Melville's washing dishes because his unemployment ran out. He didn't want to tell the gang at Cheers because it wasn't a job in his field.

questions.text: What animal followed Norm to Cheers?
questions.explanation:
cats.

	Melville's was a seafood restaurant. Since Norm started washing dishes he smelled like fish thereby attracting all the cats.

questions.text: Who suggested Sam hire Norm as an accountant?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	Diane thought that hiring Norm would help Norm's self-esteem. Sam didn't think it was a good idea but reluctantly hired Norm anyway.

questions.text: Who else did Norm do taxes for?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	Diane had a lot of faith in Norm and hired him for her taxes as well. Sam did not fully trust Norm and had another accountant check his taxes for him.

questions.text: Who was the other accountant Sam used?
questions.explanation:
Sy.

	Sam was not comfortable with the big tax return that Norm said Sam was getting. He hired someone else to check out his taxes and they said he wouldn't get money back.

questions.text: What amount did Norm say Sam would get back?
questions.explanation:
$15,000.

	Sam never turned the tax form that Norm prepared for him because he didn't trust it. The others in the bar were upset with Sam because he didn't trust Norm.

questions.text: What did Coach say Norm and Sam were making a mockery of?
questions.explanation:
Bell Day.

	Sam didn't want Norm to hear he hired another accountant so he rang the bell and said it was Bell Day. Coach thought there really was something called Bell Day.

questions.text: Did Sam end up keeping Norm on as accountant?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Norm declared his friendship with Sam over and was going to leave. However, he went back to Sam begging to not have to leave. Sam and Norm made up and Sam made Norm his official accountant.
